venue.name: State Boat Launch and Parking lot

item.description:
This is an AMC hike. (Appalachian Mountain Club)

Meet 10 am at Long Pond Pkg off Clark Rd for a pretty 6 m walk around ponds, bogs and forest. Bring water and snack, Stabilicers or snowshoes if necessary, storm cancels.

Directions: South Plymouth, Rt 3 exit 3, go SW for 0.2 mi, cross Long Pond Rd to continue on Clark Rd, 0.4 mi to T end, turn left, park across from Long Pond on right.

Difficulty: B3C  (which means it's more than 5 miles on average terrain at a moderate 2.5 mph pace)

Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts Leader: Ellie MacPherson 

(508) 224-6465,  cell 978-478-7106

Registration (with the AMC ) is not required for this activity. However, you may wish to contact the leader if you have any questions.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: AMC Halfway Pond Conservation Area hike
